text: We currently do not overwrite source files when a customer updates, rather it makes a copy of the module with the updates.
is it considered best practice to include a changelog/recent updates at the bottom in the module description?
I think that’s a great idea! Changelogs are something that we’ve been discussing a lot.
Hi all, we’ve added a side panel to all provider listings pages. The biggest change is that clicking on a listing name will now open the sidebar rather than prompting the listing flow.
